# Sample Markdown Document

This is a comprehensive markdown test fixture.

## Features

### Code Blocks

```python
def example():
    return "test"
```

```javascript
const test = () => "hello";
```

### Links and Images

- [External link](https://example.com)
- [Internal link](#features)
- ![Image](image.png)

### Lists

1. Ordered item 1
2. Ordered item 2
   - Nested unordered
   - Another nested

- Unordered item
  1. Nested ordered
  2. Another nested

### Tables

| Column 1 | Column 2 | Column 3 |
|----------|----------|----------|
| Data 1   | Data 2   | Data 3   |
| More     | Data     | Here     |

### Emphasis

**Bold text** and *italic text* and ***both***.

`Inline code` example.

> Block quote
> Multiple lines

---

Horizontal rule above.
